VINO.SETTINGS.ShowDebugLogsHint: Turn this on for bug reports
VINO.SETTINGS.DefaultFontName: What should the default font for your ViNo messages be, if an Actor doesn't override it?
VINO.SETTINGS.DefaultFontHint: Default: "Signika, sans-serif;". Supports font families and fallbacks. https://github.com/Forien/foundryvtt-forien-custom-fonts can install additional fonts.
VINO.SETTINGS.SecondsToRenderName: How many seconds should it take for a word to render?
VINO.SETTINGS.SecondsOnscreenPerWordName: How many seconds per word should the message remain onscreen?
VINO.SETTINGS.MinimumTimeOnscreenName: For short messages, what is the minimum number of seconds a message remains onscreen?
VINO.SETTINGS.SecondsBetweenScrollName: How many seconds between each check on if a message should be scrolled?
VINO.SETTINGS.SecondsBetweenScrollHint: Default: 0.5 seconds. Turning this down will increase smoothness of scrolling at the cost of performance.
VINO.SETTINGS.MaxOnscreenName: What is the max number of messages that should be shown onscreen before being put in the Queue?
VINO.SETTINGS.MaxOnscreenHint: Default: 4. Lower this for small screens, increase for large screens.
VINO.SETTINGS.AutoQuoteName: Should messages be automatically wrapped in quote characters?
VINO.SETTINGS.AutoQuoteHint: Default: True. Disable this if you tend to have longer messages that mix action and text
VINO.SETTINGS.QuoteOpeningName: When autoquoting, what character should the message be prepended with?
VINO.SETTINGS.QuoteOpeningHint: English tends to use the same quote character for both opening and closing, while Japanese uses different ones.
VINO.SETTINGS.QuoteClosingName: When autoquoting, what character should the message be appended with?
VINO.SETTINGS.QuoteClosingHint: English tends to use the same quote character for both opening and closing, while Japanese uses different ones.
